name.value: FHIR Connectathon 15 - Patient - Formal Testing - FHIR Client - Search - JSON

description.value: Patient Track - Formal Testing - tests external FHIR Client and Server to search a JSON formatted Patient with minimum data elements: identifier, name.family, name.given, gender and birthDate. The origin and destination systems must support the search operation and Patient search parameters: identifier, family and given.
Patient search operation
Enter the patient identifier search parameter the origin system will send to the destination system.
Enter the patient family search parameter the origin system will send to the destination system.
Enter the patient given search parameter the origin system will send to the destination system.
Test the search operation with JSON content. The expected response content is a searchset Bundle resource containing all matching Patient resource instances in JSON format.
Search for matching Patients and verify the search results.
Confirm that the client requested an Accept of the FHIR JSON mime type 'application/fhir+json'.
Confirm that the client did not request a Content-Type. Warning only as the client may send this by default.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Content-Type contains the FHIR mime-type 'application/fhir+json'.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle at least 1 entry. Warning only to allow for no matches.
Confirm that the Bundle total value matches or is greater than the number of entries in the Bundle. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.
Confirm that the returned Bundle resource first entry contains a Patient meta versionId element and value. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.
Confirm that the returned Bundle resource first entry contains a Patient identifier element and value. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.
Confirm that the returned Bundle resource first entry contains a Patient family name element and value. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.
Confirm that the returned Bundle resource first entry contains a Patient given name element and value. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.
Confirm that the returned Bundle resource first entry contains a Patient retained gender element and value. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.
Confirm that the returned Bundle resource first entry contains a Patient updated birthDate element and value. Warning only to provide users with reviewable results.
